Package ca.mcgill.ecse211.ziplineproject

Class Display

  • java.lang.Object
    • ca.mcgill.ecse211.ziplineproject.Display
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.Runnable

    public class Display
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.lang.Runnable
    The Display class displays Odometer data on the device LCD using a Thread. It also contains methods to format and display other information on the screen, including the user interface.

      • getStartCornerUI

        public static int getStartCornerUI​()
        User interface method to select the start corner
        Returns:

      • getXYUI

        public static int[] getXYUI​()
        User interface method to select the zipline approach coordinates
        Returns:
        The zipline coordinates, in the form of an int array {x0, y0}
